name: GET-v3-messages-msg_id
description:
This is BETA functionality. You may not have access, and we reserve the right to change functionality without notice.

Get all of the details about the specified message.

msg_id.description: The ID of the message you are requesting details for.

$ul: **from_email**: The 'From' email address used to deliver the message. This address should be a verified sender in your Twilio SendGrid account. (default: )
**msg_id**: A unique ID assigned to the message. This ID can be used to retrieve activity data for the specific message.
**api_key_id**: The ID of the API Key used to authenticate the sending request for the message.
**asm_group_id**: The unsubscribe group associated with this email.
**categories**: Categories users associated to the message
**events**: List of events related to email message
**originating_ip**: This is the IP of the user who sent the message.
**outbound_ip**: IP used to send to the remote Mail Transfer Agent.
**outbound_ip_type**: Whether or not the outbound IP is dedicated vs shared
**template_id**: The ID associated with a Twilio SendGrid email template used to format the message.
**unique_args**: JSON hash of key-value pairs associated with the message. (default: Null)
